CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, January 20, 1945, pg. 15, reads: "Prom Hostesses - The mid-year graduation prom to be given in honor of February graduates will have the above young ladies as hostesses.  They are, first row, left to right: Marguerite Dodson, Frances Bell, Elaine Davis, June Tanismore [Tansimore], Eunice Talbot and Minnie Henderson.  Back row, left to right: Gwendolyn Allen, Margaret Baulding, Beverly Moss, Lois Weaver, Alma Thomas, Marilyn Ware, Louise Wray and Peggy Moore.  Hostesses not shown in the picture are Betty Hord and Charlotte Primas."
TitMainTitle: Prom hostesses, front row from left: Marguerite Dodson, Frances Bell (Nunn), Elaine Davis, June Tansimore, Eunice Talbot, Minnie Henderson; second row: Gwendolyn Allen (Hernden), Margaret Baulding, Beverly Moss, Lois Weaver (Watson), Alma Thomas, Marilyn Ware (Parker), Louise Wray (Stewart), and Margaret "Peggy" Moore Brown, in Centre Avenue YMCA with Henry O. Tanner painting "Christ and His Mother" on wall
